span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);

p.span: West Hardin is looking to be more proactive in communicating announcements of events and general information. We have created an email address for you to send pictures of events involving our students. You can email your pictures to oilerpix@westhardin.org. Please send as many pictures as you wish, but limit them to 2 pictures per email. These pictures may be used in our office slide show or on our website or social media accounts.
